title: STAT+: Europe’s pharma policy shakeup moves forward toward enactment
description: European policymakers unveiled an agreement for the biggest shakeup to E.U. pharmaceutical policy in two decades.
content: European policymakers unveiled an agreement for the biggest shakeup to E.U. pharmaceutical policy in two decades.
